metadata.name: Sufi#001
metadata.description:
Some of the sages say that the spirit is eternal. Some say that it is "newly arrived"-that is, at first it was not, then it came to be. Nonetheless, it's quite some time since there was the togetherness of the spirits. The spirits are ranked troops.

Me and Rumi
(The Autobiography of Shams-i Tabrizi)
By William C. Chittick
